title: Opening ceremony typeface
content:
Hi guys  
anyone know what typeface this is please  
 [http://www.openingceremony.us/images/hm2/logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113011533/http:/www.openingceremony.us/images/hm2/logo.png "http://www.openingceremony.us/images/hm2/logo.png")

also - what kind of M is it when it does not touch the baseline? Is there a specific typographic term for such an M

Thanks
author: cm983
